segments.text: Excuse me , are there any more shopping carts ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you can find it at the entrance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But there isn't a single one right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I'll get one for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here it is . It â€™ s really hard to find a shopping cart at this moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks a lot . By the way , do you make the deliveries ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We make deliveries only for bulk buying .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but the charge is rather low .
segments.speaker: S2
